name: Kyoto
description: A city known for temples, traditions, and cherry blossoms.
bestTimeToVisit: March to May and October to November
travelTips: Buy a prepaid transit card for buses and trains.
Visit temples early in the morning to avoid crowds.
Respect local customs at shrines and temples.

name: Tokyo
description: A modern metropolis full of life, culture, and neon.
bestTimeToVisit: March to May and September to November
access: Direct flights to Narita/Haneda; Shinkansen from Osaka
travelTips: Use the subway to avoid traffic jams.
Carry cash, as some places do not accept cards.
